# my-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                              | Type                                 | Default          |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ---------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable button                                           | `boolean`                            | `false`          |
| `fluid`    | `fluid`    | Make button grow to 100%                                 | `boolean`                            | `true`           |
| `kind`     | `kind`     | Button kind                                              | `"danger" \| "default" \| "primary"` | `"default"`      |
| `text`     | `text`     | Optional string that can be used to set the button value | `string`                             | `"Download App"` |
